text: Dimitrie Prelipcean (November 18, 1927, Horodnicul de Jos, Suceava County-July 29, 1987) was Romanian writer, whose works trace the history of his native Bukovina in the wake of World War II and the early years of the Communist regime. ==Works == * Drumuri şi popasuri * A fost odată * Iubiri neîmplinite Category:1927 births Category:1987 deaths Category:People from Suceava County Category:Romanian writers
title: Dimitrie Prelipcean
